bonus.name: Late-Night Mischief
bonus.desc: What are you doing awake? Go to sleep; no bonus for you!

bonus.name: Early-Morning Mischief
bonus.desc: >What are you doing awake? Go to sleep; no bonus for you!

bonus.name: Early-Morning Mischief
bonus.desc: What are you doing awake? Go to sleep; no bonus for you!

bonus.name: Early Riser
bonus.desc: You know what they say, "Those who wake early, usually take a nap later."

bonus.name: Civilization Time
bonus.desc: You see what I did there? Civilization 5. 5:00 am. Clever, eh?

bonus.name: Early Bird Special
bonus.desc: Free entree with a purchase of 4 side dishes!

bonus.name: A Fine Bonus
bonus.desc: Hm, HMMMM! Yes, what a fine day for mayoring!

bonus.name: Tom Nook's Opening
bonus.desc: Chip-chip-choo. I heard you want to buy this house. Chip-chip-chee. I heard you owe me some money.

bonus.name: Bruncheon!
bonus.desc: Like luncheon but better! At least the bonus is...

bonus.name: Bunny Hour
bonus.desc: Oh yeah! It's time for a super ultra spectacular amazing surprising kind-of-the-best-thing-ever production increase!

bonus.name: Espa(~n)ol tiempo!
bonus.desc: Me creer(`i)as si te digo que yo habr(`i)a puesto un multiplier de cuarto de cien en este bonus?

bonus.name: Luncheon!
bonus.desc: Have a Caesar salad with a side of Julius juice.

bonus.name: RAnDom hOuR!
bonus.desc: Nothing too special. Just a random hour.

bonus.name: Burst of Energy
bonus.desc: Gotta love that crash at 2 o' clock.

bonus.name: Artist's hour
bonus.desc: A great artist once said, "True art is characterized by an irresistible urge in the creative artist."

bonus.name: Time for Tea!
bonus.desc: Queen Elizabeth would approve.

bonus.name: Homework Frenzy
bonus.desc: Uuuuughhh...It's a me. Mario.

bonus.name: Dinnereon!
bonus.desc: Like luncheon but with a twist--slightly better production!

bonus.name: Sunset Siesta
bonus.desc: Ah, sunsets are so nice!

bonus.name: Darkness Begins
bonus.desc: And so, the sun set, and the world grew cold.

bonus.name: Secret Hour
bonus.desc: Shh! It's a secret to everybody.

bonus.name: Space Quest Time!
bonus.desc: ~~~Mycaruba~~~

bonus.name: Yawn...
bonus.desc: It's pretty late. You sh...oh hey Big Zam!

bonus.name: Late-Night Mischief
bonus.desc: What are you doing awake? Go to sleep; no bonus for you!
